net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.tools.modifier

Interface ModifierAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SmartAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BringCloserCeilingAction, BringCloserFloorAction, DecreaseFlatAction, DecreasePercentAmount, FloorCeilingAction, IncreaseDistanceCeilingAction, IncreaseDistanceFloorAction, IncreaseFlatAction, IncreasePercentAction

    public interface ModifierAction
    Performs a particular action on values that are passed to it one by one returning the new value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double performAction(double driverProperty)
      Performs an action on the passed value modifying it.

    • Method Detail

      • performAction

        double performAction(double driverProperty)
        Performs an action on the passed value modifying it.
        Parameters:
        driverProperty - value to be modified.
        Returns:
        modified driver's property.
